description: Try our easy to follow Basil & Kale Bruschetta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bruschetta & crostini,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Christmas,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Basil & Kale Bruschetta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Combine oil and garlic in a small bowl.
Remove kale leaves from centre vein and finely slice. Add to a bowl with tomato, onion and basil. Toss to combine. Season to taste with salt and pepper.

Drizzle bread slices with garlic oil and place on tray. Bake for 2-3 minutes until golden. Drizzle remaining garlic oil and balsamic vinegar over kale mixture. Pile mixture onto toast slices and garnish with fresh basil leaves.
